1.name: Stomp
1.description: When the Rhino puts his foot down, everyone listens.

2.name: Slam
2.description: Some heavy hits make mincemeat outta anyone.

3.name: Ram
3.description: He's Rhino. He knocks things down. That's what he does. That's who he is.

signature.name: Rhino Armor
signature.description: A thick polymer suit enhances Rhino's gamma-based strength and resilience, increasing his Physical Resistance.

description: Aleksei Sytsevich's life changed the moment he stepped into an experimental suit – and became the rampaging Rhino! What he lacks in brainpower, he makes up in strength, speed, and a thick hide. And whatever you do, don't get him angry – or you'll end up on the wrong side of his razor-sharp horns!
